uncc2014watsonsim.research

Class Researcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • uncc2014watsonsim.research.Researcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeFitbAnswerToContentsOfBlanks, HyphenTrimmer, MediaWikiTrimmer, Merge, PassageRetrieval, PersonRecognition, RedirectSynonyms, WekaTee

    public abstract class Researcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Researchers can modify questions and have the guarantee of running sequentially. They also do not return double's because they are not expected to do scoring. If they do, they can use score() themselves. Consider using Scorer instead for that, which is parallelizable.

        public void research(Question q)

      • complete

        public void complete()
        Default implementation for ending question research. This might trigger some database inserts or like writing, for example.
